We help high-impact founders deploy low-carbon solutions

EnergyLab is Australia’s largest climate tech startup accelerator and innovation ecosystem dedicated to reaching net zero emissions. We connect talented founders addressing the global climate crisis to the mentors, advisors, partners, peers and investors they need to succeed.










Join our community of climate tech founders

EnergyLab has a range of programs and membership offerings designed to support any clean energy and climate tech founder in the world to gain access to the community, connections and support they need to grow their startup.
Memberships









We offer 9 programs for climate tech startups







Women in Climate and Energy Fellowship
Providing the skills, knowledge and networks to help women take their first steps towards starting a company.



                                    Read more






Climate Tech Ignite
Supporting aspiring and early-stage founders to generate, test and launch their startup idea.



                                    Read more






Climate Tech Ignite for Researchers
Supporting researchers at the cutting-edge of decarbonisation technologies to commercialise their innovations through entrepreneurship



                                    Read more






Climate Tech Charge
Supporting high-potential startups to build traction, connect with investors and prepare to acquire seed funding.



                                    Read more






Climate Solutions Accelerator
Connecting talented founders with the investors, advisors and supporters they need to roll out their climate tech solutions.



                                    Read more






Energy Scaleup Program
Bringing late-stage startups and innovative energy companies together to jointly deploy new energy solutions.



                                    Read more






Going International Bootcamp
For startups ready to focus on expanding into markets outside of Australia.



                                    Read more






Climate Tech Investment Ready Program (QLD)
Supporting Queensland's climate tech startups on their path to raising capital.



                                    Read more






Supercharge Australia Innovation Challenge
Targeting startups, entrepreneurs and visionary teams to join us and build the future of the Australian lithium battery value chain.



                                    Read more

We support startups nationwide from our offices in Sydney and Melbourne






While our programs are delivered online, we have offices in Melbourne and Sydney (in Sydney we also have a coworking and events space).










Keep up to date with all things happening in the climate tech startup innovation ecosystem
We send a newsletter at the start of each month and occasionally an event invitation.

Programs
No matter which part of the entrepreneurial journey you're at, we're here to help










A program for each stage of the startup journey
We've developed unique programs that provide clean energy and climate tech founders the support, expertise and networks they require to reach their next growth milestone.






Women in Climate and Energy Fellowship
You want to know what it takes to be a climate tech founder. We'll equip you with the skills, know-how and network to take the first steps in entrepreneurship.


Read more






Climate Tech Ignite Program
You're eager to learn about climate tech and come up with an impactful startup idea. We'll support you to come up with ideas, start to test them, and craft a value proposition.


Read more






Climate Tech Ignite for Researchers Program
You're eager to bring your decarbonisation technology research to life in a startup. We'll support you to understand who your customer might be, and to craft an impactful value proposition.


Read more






Climate Tech Charge Program
You have an MVP and evidence of customer interest. Now it's time to test, iterate, build and grow. The Charge Program will support you to build customer traction, develop your product and acquire seed funding.


Read more






Climate Solutions Accelerator
You're the founder of a climate tech startup and are ready for explosive growth. We'll help you raise capital, grow your network and expand your business.


Read more






Energy Scaleup Program
You're generating revenue and have proven your technology. This program will help you roll out your solution by connecting you with the most innovative energy companies in Australia and New Zealand.


Read more






Going International Bootcamp
You're ready to roll out your solution abroad and are interested in exploring international markets. This program will help you understand the factors for a successful market entry and establish key international connections.


Read more






Supercharge Australia
Backed by Boundless, Supercharge Australia is the first initiative of EnergyLab's recently announced partnership with global clean energy startup accelerator New Energy Nexus.


Read more






Supercharge Australia Innovation Challenge #2: Retrofit Nation
You’re the founder of an innovative startup in the lithium battery value chain and focussed on EV retrofitting, looking for support to face your challenges. You’ll go through a hyper-accelerated innovation process supported by mentors, speakers and your cohort.


Read more






Investment Ready Program (Queensland)
Supporting Queensland's most ambitious climate tech startups on their path to raising capital.


Read more

Not to worry! Enquire via the button below and we'll be in touch.
